protein.specific_function: Because S100A10 induces the dimerization of ANXA2/p36, it may function as a regulator of protein phosphorylation in that the ANXA2 monomer is the preferred target (in vitro) of tyrosine- specific kinase

reference.reference_text: Kube E, Weber K, Gerke V: Primary structure of human, chicken, and Xenopus laevis p11, a cellular ligand of the Src-kinase substrate, annexin II. Gene. 1991 Jun 30;102(2):255-9.
